services.meta_title: Mental Health Billing Services | Ardur Healthcare
services.meta_description: Get expert mental health billing services for therapists, psychologists, and psychiatrists. Maximize revenue and reduce denials with Ardur Healthcare.
h2_sections: Why Choose Ardur Healthcare for Mental Health Billing?
Ready to Simplify Your Mental Health Billing?
Who We Help with Mental Health Billing
Frequently Asked Questions - Mental Health Billing
services.description: Expert billing support for psychiatrists, therapists, and mental health providers with specialized knowledge of behavioral health coding and compliance requirements.
challenges: Managing time-based coding and session duration
Claim denials for missing documentation or authorization
Complex billing requirements for different therapy types
Prior authorization challenges for mental health services
Telehealth billing compliance and regulations
solutions: Accurate CPT/ICD coding and documentation review
Specialty-driven workflows for psychologists and psychiatrists
Proactive denial management and appeals process

faqs.question: What mental health specialties do you support?
faqs.answer: We provide billing services for psychologists, psychiatrists, therapists (LCSWs, LPCs, LMFTs), and behavioral health clinics across the U.S.

faqs.question: How do you handle time-based therapy billing?
faqs.answer: We ensure accurate CPT code selection and documentation review for all time-based psychotherapy sessions, including 90832, 90834, and 90837.

faqs.question: Can you bill both therapy and med management for the same day?
faqs.answer: Yes. We ensure proper modifier usage and payer-specific guidelines to bill therapy and psychiatry services on the same date.

faqs.question: Do you support mental health billing for telehealth?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We follow payer-specific telehealth policies and use appropriate POS codes and modifiers for virtual visits.

faqs.question: What EHRs are you compatible with?
faqs.answer: We integrate with most mental health EHRs, including TheraNest, SimplePractice, Valant, TherapyNotes, and others.

services.meta_title: Behavioral Health Billing Services | Ardur Healthcare
services.meta_description: Expert behavioral health billing services for clinics, therapists, & addiction centers. Improve revenue, reduce denials, & stay compliant with Ardur Healthcare.
h2_sections: Why Choose Ardur Healthcare for Behavioral Health Billing?
Ready to Streamline Your Behavioral Health Billing?
Who We Help with Behavioral Health Billing
Frequently Asked Questions - Behavioral Health Billing
services.description: Specialized billing support for behavioral health and substance use providers with comprehensive knowledge of addiction treatment billing and compliance.
challenges: Complex coding for behavioral interventions and substance use disorders
Denials due to unclear documentation or level of care issues
Inconsistent payer rules across behavioral health services
Prior authorization requirements for intensive programs
Compliance with state and federal addiction treatment regulations
solutions: Accurate CPT/ICD coding for all behavioral health levels
Templates for IOP, PHP, and SUD documentation compliance
Payer-specific edits and denial prevention workflows

faqs.question: What services are included in behavioral health billing?
faqs.answer: We handle coding, claims, eligibility checks, A/R, and payer compliance for therapy, psychiatry, IOPs, PHPs, and substance use programs.

faqs.question: What's the difference between mental and behavioral health billing?
faqs.answer: Behavioral health billing includes mental health services plus substance use disorders, behavioral therapy, and broader interventions.

faqs.question: Do you work with behavioral health clinics and solo therapists?
faqs.answer: Yes. We support all practice sizes, from single therapists to large group practices and intensive outpatient programs.

faqs.question: Can you help with behavioral health billing software setup?
faqs.answer: We integrate with major systems like TheraNest, TherapyNotes, Valant, and other behavioral health-specific platforms.

faqs.question: What makes your billing solutions different?
faqs.answer: Our behavioral health billing services are compliance-driven, specialty-specific, and focused on maximizing collections while maintaining regulatory compliance.

faqs.question: Do you handle billing for psychological testing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in billing for all types of psychological testing including neuropsychological assessments, IQ testing, and diagnostic evaluations.

faqs.question: How do you ensure accurate coding for psychology services?
faqs.answer: Our certified coders have specialized training in psychology CPT codes and stay current with APA billing guidelines and payer requirements.

faqs.question: Can you help with insurance authorization for testing?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We handle prior authorization requests for psychological testing and evaluations, including appeals when necessary.

faqs.question: What therapy types do you bill for?
faqs.answer: We bill for individual, group, family, and couples therapy using appropriate CPT codes and time-based billing requirements.

faqs.question: Do you work with all major insurance plans?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with all major insurance carriers and understand their specific requirements for psychology services billing.

faqs.question: How do you handle insurance verification for chiropractic services?

faqs.answer: We have extensive experience with chiropractic denial patterns and successful appeal strategies to maximize collections.

services.meta_title: Massage Therapy Billing Services | Ardur Healthcare

services.description: Specialized massage therapy billing services for licensed therapists with expertise in medical necessity documentation and insurance compliance.
challenges: Limited insurance coverage for massage therapy services
Medical necessity documentation requirements
Proper CPT code selection and usage
Prior authorization requirements
Integration with other healthcare providers
solutions: Accurate CPT coding and billing practices

faqs.question: Can massage therapy be billed to insurance?
faqs.answer: Yes, when medically necessary and prescribed by a healthcare provider. We help verify coverage and ensure proper documentation.

faqs.question: What CPT codes are used for massage therapy?
faqs.answer: Common codes include 97124 (massage) and 97140 (manual therapy), depending on the specific treatment and documentation.

faqs.question: How do you prove medical necessity for massage therapy?
faqs.answer: We provide documentation templates and guidance to ensure medical necessity is clearly established with proper diagnosis codes and treatment plans.

faqs.question: Do you help with referral-based billing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we coordinate with referring providers and ensure proper billing under physician supervision when required.

faqs.question: Can you handle out-of-network billing?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We can process out-of-network claims and provide superbills for patient reimbursement.

challenges: Complex specialty-specific coding requirements
Varying insurance coverage by specialty
Unique documentation and compliance needs
Specialty-specific denial patterns
Keeping up with regulatory changes

faqs.question: What medical specialties do you support?
faqs.answer: We provide billing services for over 40 medical specialties including mental health, cardiology, orthopedics, dermatology, and many more.

faqs.question: How do you ensure specialty-specific compliance?
faqs.answer: Our billing teams receive specialized training in each specialty's unique coding, documentation, and regulatory requirements.

faqs.question: Can you handle multiple specialties for one practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can manage billing for multi-specialty practices with customized workflows for each specialty area.

faqs.question: What if my specialty isn't listed?
faqs.answer: We work with virtually any medical specialty. Contact us to discuss your specific billing needs and requirements.

faqs.question: How quickly can you start billing for my specialty?
faqs.answer: Typically within 1-2 weeks depending on specialty complexity and any required setup or credentialing.
